HomePage.heroSubtitle: Create, refine, and translate content with the power of Gemini AI. Unleash your creativity without limits and take your ideas to the next level.
HomePage.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Create Impactful Content
HomePage.feature1Description: Transform your ideas into complete articles. Just provide a topic and let our AI generate an initial draft, even with a main image!
HomePage.feature2Description: Perfect your texts. Our AI can review and enhance your existing articles, suggesting improvements and polishing your message.
HomePage.feature3Description: Break language barriers. Translate your articles into multiple languages quickly and accurately, expanding your reach.
HomePage.geminiApiTitle: Powered by Gemini: Free and Easy Access
HomePage.geminiApiIntro: AegisPad utilizes Google's powerful Gemini API for its artificial intelligence features, offering you cutting-edge results.
HomePage.geminiApiGetFree: To get started, you'll need your own Gemini API Key. You can get one for free from <link>Google AI Studio</link>.
HomePage.geminiApiFreeTier: Great news! With Gemini's free tier, you get approximately 1 million tokens per month at no cost, enough for a vast amount of content creation!
HomePage.tokenEstimationIntro: Understanding token consumption helps you manage your free quota and plan your work efficiently.
HomePage.tokenEstimationMonthly: With 1 million free tokens per month, you could, for example, create over 200 short articles or perform hundreds of revisions and translations.
HomePage.tokenEstimationNote: Note: These are estimates. Actual usage may vary based on content complexity, length, and the specific Gemini model used.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.sampleQ1Content: AegisPad is an intelligent article forge that helps you create, refine, and translate content using the power of Gemini AI and secure your Gemini API key with Hive Keychain.
FaqPage.sampleQ2Title: How do I get a Gemini API Key?
FaqPage.sampleQ2Content: You can get a Gemini API Key for free from Google AI Studio. AegisPad uses this key to power its AI features. The free tier offers a generous amount of tokens for content creation.
FaqPage.sampleQ3Title: How is my Gemini API key stored?
FaqPage.sampleQ3Content: Your Gemini API key, once provided, is encrypted using your Hive Keychain account (specifically, your Posting key) and stored locally in your browser's local storage. It is decrypted only when needed to interact with the Gemini API and is never sent to our servers unencrypted.
